bug_report.Title: Date in "Calendario Economico" not translated on selected language
bug_report.Steps: 1. Navigate to capital.com 2. Choice language except EN 3. Scroll down to block "Calendario Economico"
bug_report.Expected_Result: Date in "Calendario Economico" translated on selected language
bug_report.Actual_Result: Date in "Calendario Economico" not translated on selected language
